question:
It seems clear that obesity in today’s society is to some extent due to the availability of fast food. 

Should governments place a tax on fast food to reduce the amount of fast food consumed?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your knowledge or experience.
text: Undoubtedly it is true fact that in the cutting-edge era consumption of feed level is increasing day by day towards street foods .

In the present climate availability of fast fares is very increasing . In my ,opin lawmakers should place a charge on non-digestive feed to diminish the level of pre-cooked food . This essay will discuss the reasons in the upcoming paragraphs .

To commence with , the pattern of containing food is totally changed. To illustrate it , the masses are becoming make obesity with the consumption of prepared food . It is a big obstacle for our modern generation . For instance , in the 19th century individuals were taken very good diets
Whereas in modern times  folks are adopting new quality of the food which is street food . Hence , they become very fatty and they lost everything in their life .
Shifting towards reasons , the primary reason for this is overfeeding . Masses take more and more diet and they make a new life of obesity .

Another hidden reason is funding. To explain it , the modern generation has ample remuneration for taking a good diet like they easily purchase anything which they want . For example , one of the famous individuals Sahil Khan  is a very wealthy person and with the help of a chunk of ,money he can get anything . Thus , without more funding can not take good food ,Verity .
To sum up , it is not wrong , the masses take fast food and make very corpulence because it is not wealthy for future.

error_list.error_des: It appears that 19th century is missing a hyphen. Consider adding the hyphen(s).
It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
